title: The Faint - 2001 - Danse Macabre [FLAC]
description:
Danse Macabre is the third studio album by the Omaha based New Wave band The Faint and it is the 37th release of Saddle Creek Records. It was released on August 21, 2001 in the US and roughly a year later in the UK, where it has enjoyed similar popularity.

The first pressing of Danse Macabre on vinyl included a different unauthorized photo that led to them being pulled and having the covers re-printed.

The album was followed in 2003 by the Danse Macabre Remixes. The remix album includes mixes by Photek, Junior Sanchez and Paul Oakenfold, among others.

Track Listing
01 - Agenda Suicide
02 - Glass Danse
03 - Total Job
04 - Let The  Poison Spill from Your Throat
05 - Your Retro Career Melted
06 - Posed to Death
07 - The Conductor
08 - Violent
09 - Ballad of a Paralysed Citizen

All tracks are DRM-free and encoded losslessly in FLAC format (16 bit, stereo, 44.1 kHz). For more information about FLAC visit http://flac.sourceforge.net/. Album summary courtesy of Wikipedia and is available under the terms of the GNU Free Documentation License.
